General.Name: Hubei Geoway Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Geoway Investment Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells Internet of Things equipment, electronic products, image vision technology products, sensors, and related software and hardware in China. It also engages in computer software production and technical development; provision of technical consulting and technical services; import and export of goods and technologies; provision of investment consulting and investment management services; and provision of marketing services. In addition, it is involved in short video, live e-commerce, and show and e-sports anchor incubation businesses. Hubei Geoway Investment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
